name: Add Google Sheets rows for new Order Desk ordersÂ imported
description: Every time a new order is imported to your Order Desk, Make will automatically add it to your Google Sheets as a row. Here's the [sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/13XJe5rmagXjJsBLNgj-ZRnFaZGlh_owTz8Vf-TqvmPI/edit?usp=sharing) used in this scenario.
